channel.title: I Cannot connect to my own Server!?!
channel.description:
I have a server named 'SkaarjPK' I ran it for a while without any problems, then I stopped running it and stopped port forwarding. Then after about 3 or 4 months I wanted to connect to my server and fix it up. but when I run the source and the client and try to connect. I get an error that said 'Error connecting to server' so then I uninstalled MySQL and it worked, I connected and played around a bit, but then when I logged out and tried another account I got the same problem, and yes, I cannot log back in with any other account.
I have no clue how this is possible, but any suggestions would help. Thanks everyone <3

item.title: I Cannot connect to my own Server!?!
